author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Lupin Merchandise
body:
>From ANS:

"On the heels of the new Lupin III OVA Ikiteita Majutsushi due on April 3rd, 
Gakken will debut the Lupin III Majutsushi Pycal 1971 vs 2002 book and 
figure set on May 17 2002. The book includes comparisons of new works 
against the originals, descriptions of the two Pycal stories (the first 
being episode 2 of the first TV series in 1971), a selection of episodes 
from the first series and an interview with the producer. A 17cm figure will 
be modelled on the new OVA and come with a base. Two figures will be 
available: one of Lupin, the other of Fujiko. Price 2,500 Yen."
